object_name.value: Validate selected template is not checked-out

title.value: Used to validate if the selected template is not locked or checked out.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
''$value(object_name)'' must be checked-in before using this function.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select * from cd_content_template(all) where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and r_lock_owner != ' ')
